alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 4:56PM AKST until February 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow mixing with freezing rain expected. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
